articles.author: NBC News
articles.title: Trump nominates loyalist Kash Patel to serve as FBI director
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump announced he would pick Kash Patel, the former chief of staff to to the acting secretary of defense during the first Trump administration, to serve as director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation.
articles.content:
President-elect Donald Trump announced Saturday he would pick Kashyap "Kash" Patel, a 44-year-old loyalist with little significant experience in federal law enforcement, to serve as director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Global Tensions Rise Amid Geopolitical Maneuvers
articles.description: The summary highlights recent geopolitical developments, including Trump-Trudeau talks on tariffs, Kosovo-Serbia tensions, Irish electoral outcomes, protests in Georgia, Israeli airstrikes in Gaza, Syrian conflict escalations, Icelandic elections, and British PM Starmer’s policy goals. Trump's warning to BRICS on currency also adds a financial layer to global tensions.

articles.title: Trump nominates daughter Ivanka Trump’s father-in-law, Charles Kushner, for ambassador to France
articles.description: However, Charles Kushner, in 2005, had pleaded guilty to 16 counts of tax evasion, one count of retaliating against a federal witness and one more count of lying to the Federal Election Commission.
articles.content:
President-elect Donald Trump has shortlisted his daughter Ivanka Trump’s father-in-law, Charles Kushner, a businessman, to serve as the next US ambassador to France.

articles.title: Hostage Edan Alexander shown in video; parents urge Trump to secure his return
articles.description: Edan Alexander, a 20-year-old Israeli soldier and U.S. citizen held hostage by Hamas since Oct. 7, 2023, was shown alive in a propaganda video released Saturday, prompting fresh pleas by his parents for his return.

articles.title: Young men swung to the right for Donald Trump after a campaign dominated by masculine appeals
articles.description: Although much of the electorate shifted right to varying degrees in 2024, young men were one of the groups that swung sharply toward Trump.
articles.content:

articles.title: Young men swung right for Trump after campaign on masculinity
articles.description: Young men shifted toward Donald Trump in the 2024 presidential election in a change from recent years, when most young male voters backed the Democratic candidate.

articles.title: Trump threatens 100% tariff on the BRIC bloc of nations if they act to undermine US dollar
articles.description: Trump says he wants a commitment from the bloc that it will not create a new currency or otherwise try to undermine the U.S. dollar.
